meanings.definition: A person or thing that shrieks loudly.
meanings.sent1: The shriekers at the concert made my ears hurt.
meanings.sent2: The forest was filled with the sounds of shriekers in the night.
meanings.sent3: The group of shriekers in the haunted house scared everyone.
meanings.sent4: The sirens of the ambulance echoed like shriekers in the empty street.
meanings.sent5: The shriekers in the horror movie made the audience jump in their seats.

meanings.sent1: We could hear the shriekers from the other side of the field.
meanings.sent2: The shriekers gathered outside the stadium after the game.
meanings.sent3: The shriekers in the choir practice were quite enthusiastic.
meanings.sent4: The shriekers of the seagulls filled the beach with noise.
meanings.sent5: The shriekers of the children playing echoed through the park.
